DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the clinical efficacy and safety in patients with Laryngopharyngitis or Tonsillitis or Acute Bacterial Rhinosinusitis receiving a dose of 2 g of azithromycin in the SR formulation.
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Of Azithromycin SR For The Treatment Of Laryngopharyngitis or Tonsillitis or Acute Bacterial Rhinosinusitis
DOC.criteria: Patients who were diagnosed Laryngopharyngitis or Tonsillitis or Acute Bacterial Rhinosinusitis Severe underlying disease; patients in which drug clinical evaluation is difficult because of confounding diseases.
